addRemoveCleverClassrooms: Visit https://clever.com/ and confirm your classroom is connected to Code.org.
addRemoveGoogleClassrooms: Visit https://classroom.google.com/ to add and remove classrooms.
addSectionName: Enter a name for your section that will help you remember which classroom it is for. Your students will also be able to see this name.
addStudentsManageMyOwn: Create and manage my own list of students
addStudentsSyncThirdParty: Sync my list of students from an existing classroom section in a third party tool
addStudentsToSectionInstructions: Choose how you want to add your students:
allowEditingInstructions: "Allow editing" while students should be taking the assessment.
announcementDescriptionCspScores: Over 70% of students earned passing scores in the first ever CS Principles exam.
assignACourse: Assign a course to your classroom or start your own course.
assignCourseConfirm: Are you sure you want to assign "{courseName}" to "{sectionName}"?
authorizeGoogleClassrooms: Click here to authorize Google Classroom.
challengeLevelIntro: Challenge Puzzles are lessons designed to push your skills to a new level.
challengeLevelPassText: However, you could've done it with only {idealBlocks, plural, one {1 block} other {# blocks}}. Can you make your program even better?
clearPuzzleConfirm: این کار معما را به حالت ابتدایی تنظیم خواهد کرد و تمام بلوک هایی که شما اضافه کردید یا تغییر داده اید را حذف خواهد کرد.
clearPuzzleConfirmHeader: آیا مطمئنی که می خواهی دوباره شروع کنی؟
codeTooltip: کد جاوا اسکریپت تولید شده رو ببین.
completedWithoutRecommendedBlock: تبریک میگم! شما پازل {puzzleNumber} را تمام کرده اید. (اما شما می تواند بلوک مختلف برای کد های قوی تر استفاده کنید.)
containedLevelRunDisabledTooltip: You need to answer the question before you can run the code
coursesCardDescription: Find a new course to keep challenging yourself.
coursesHeadingDescription: Create an account to save your progress and projects. Or just start coding - no account needed. All courses are available at no cost.
coursesHeadingSubText: {linesCount} lines of code written by {studentsCount} million students.
coursesUiTipsTeacherCourses: We've updated this page just for teachers. Find the next course for your classroom here.
createNewClassroom: Create a new classroom section to start assigning courses and seeing your student progress.
createSectionsInfo: Create new sections and add students to them. Sections help you organize students into smaller groups so you can track their progress and manage their accounts.
dataLimitAlert: The app has been reading or writing to the database too frequently, which may result in unexpected failures.  Please let the app owner know if you keep experiencing issues.
dataTabExplanation: Your app can store data (like high scores and survey results) that gets saved even after you reset your app. Before you run your app, use this tab to plan out your key/value pairs or your data tables. You can enter, edit, and delete data directly from this tab or by using the data blocks within your app.
dataTableCaption: Create data tables to store rows of data with multiple columns for different fields.
defaultTwitterText: آنچه من ساخته ام را امتحان کن
disabledButtonsInfo: Your progress and code will not be saved during Hour of Code.
disabledProgress1: Any progress you make this week on your course will not be saved due to the level of traffic our site receives for the Hour of Code week.
disabledProgress2: This is why all your bubbles are displayed as gray (don’t worry, your progress from before this week is still safe).
disabledProgress3: We encourage you to try Hour of Code tutorials instead this week.
dropletBlock_andOperator_description: تنها در حالتی که هر دو عبارت صحیح یا هردو غلط باشند نتیجه صحیح بازمی گرداند
dropletBlock_assign_x_description: یک مقدار به یکی از متغییر های موجود بدهید. برای مثال x=0;
dropletBlock_callMyFunction_description: تابعی را صدا میزند که هیچ پارامتری دریافت نمیکند
dropletBlock_callMyFunction_n_descriptio: تابعی را صدا میزند که یک یا چند پارامتر دریافت می کند
dropletBlock_callMyFunction_n_signatureO: تابعی را صدا بزن که پارامتر دریافت می کند
dropletBlock_comment_description: Write a description of some code
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_array_1_4_d: Create a variable and initialize it as an array
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_array_1_4_s: Declare a variable assigned to an array
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_description: Declares a variable with the given name after 'var', and assigns it to the value on the right side of the expression
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_prompt_desc: Create a variable and assign it a value by displaying a prompt
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_prompt_sign: Prompt the user for a value and store it
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_promptNum_d: Declares that the code will now use a variable and assign it an initial numerical value provided by the user
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_promptNum_s: Prompt the user for a numerical value and store it
dropletBlock_declareNoAssign_x_descripti: Declares a variable with the given name after 'var'
dropletBlock_equalityOperator_descriptio: Test whether two values are equal. Returns true if the value on the left-hand side of the expression equals the value on the right-hand side of the expression, and false otherwise
dropletBlock_forLoop_i_0_4_description: Creates a loop consisting of an initialization expression, a conditional expression, an incrementing expression, and a block of statements executed for each iteration of the loop
dropletBlock_functionParams_n_descriptio: A set of statements that takes in one or more parameters, and performs a task or calculate a value when the function is called
dropletBlock_functionParams_none_descrip: A set of statements that perform a task or calculate a value when the function is called
dropletBlock_getTime_description: Get the current time in milliseconds
dropletBlock_greaterThanOperator_descrip: Tests whether a number is greater than another number. Returns true if the value on the left-hand side of the expression is strictly greater than the value on the right-hand side of the expression
dropletBlock_greaterThanOrEqualOperator_: Tests whether a value is greater than or equal to another value. Returns true if the value on the left-hand side of the expression is greater than or equal to the value on the right-hand side of the expression.
dropletBlock_ifBlock_description: Do something only if a condition is true
dropletBlock_ifElseBlock_description: Do something if a condition is true, otherwise do something else
dropletBlock_lessThanOrEqualOperator_des: Tests whether a value is less than or equal to another value. Returns true if the value on the left-hand side of the expression is less than or equal to the value on the right-hand side of the expression.
dropletBlock_mathMax_param0_description: One or more numbers to compare.
dropletBlock_mathMin_param0_description: One or more numbers to compare.
dropletBlock_mathRandom_description: Returns a random number ranging from 0 (inclusive) up to but not including 1 (exclusive)
dropletBlock_playSound_description: Plays the MP3 sound file from the specified URL.
dropletBlock_playSound_param0_descriptio: The URL to a sound file. Can be a project asset name or external URL.
dropletBlock_playSound_param1_descriptio: If true, loop the sound until asked to stop.
dropletBlock_randomNumber_description: Returns a random number in the closed range from min to max.
dropletBlock_return_description: Return a value from a function
dropletBlock_stopSound_description: Stops playing the sound file from the specified URL, or all sounds if no URL is given.
dropletBlock_stopSound_param0_descriptio: The URL to a sound file. Can be an project asset name or external URL.
dropletBlock_whileBlock_description: Repeat something while a condition is true
emailConfirmationText: You must confirm the email address you use to sign into this account before we can convert your account to a teacher account.
emptyBlockInFunction: تابع {name} یک وروردی پر نشده دارد.
emptyBlockInVariable: متغیر {name} یک ورودی پر نشده دارد.
emptyBlocksErrorMsg: بلوکهای "تکرار" یا "شرطی" برای کار کردن نیاز به بلوکهای دیگری در داخل خود دارند. مطمئن شوید که بلوک داخلی به درستی درون بلوک اصلی قرار گرفته است.
emptyExampleBlockErrorMsg: شما حداقل یک مثال در تابع {functionName} نیاز دارید. مطمئن شوید هر مثال یک فراخوان و نتیجه دارد.
emptyFunctionBlocksErrorMsg: بلوک تابع برای به کار افتادن نیاز به بلوک های دیگری در داخل خود دارد.
emptyFunctionalBlock: شما یک بلوک با یک ورودی پر نشده دارید.
emptyTopLevelBlock: هیچ بلوکی برای اجرا وجود ندارد. شما باید یک بلوک به بلوک{topLevelBlockName} متصل کنید.
enableMakerDialogWarning: Warning: Your app will NOT work unless you have an Adafruit Circuit Playground board.
enableMakerDialogDescription: This is a new feature for the Computer Science Discoveries curriculum being piloted this year. See the setup page for more details:
englishOnlyWarning: Sorry! This stage is not available in your language. The puzzles in this stage use a mix of English words and characters that can’t be translated right now. You can move on to Stage {nextStage}.
enrollmentDescription: Join your teacher's classroom by entering their section code below. Teachers will be able to see your course progress, projects, and reset your password in case you forget it.
errorEmptyFunctionBlockModal: باید بلوکهایی در تعریف تابع تو باشند. روی ویرایش کلیک کن و بلوکها را به داخل بلوک سبز بکش.
errorIncompleteBlockInFunction: روی ویرایش کلیک کن که مطمئن بشوی داخل تعریف تابعت هیچ بلوکی را از قلم نینداختی.
errorGenericLintError: Your program contains an editor warning that needs to be corrected. Hover over the icons near the line numbers in the editor to learn more.
errorParamInputUnattached: یادت باشه که روی بلوک تابع در فضای کاریت، به هر پارامتر ورودی یک بلوک بچسبانی.
errorQuestionMarksInNumberField: سعی کنید به جای "؟؟؟" یک مقدار قرار دهید .
errorRequiredParamsMissing: یک پارامتر برای تابعت بساز با کلیک کردن روی "ویرایش" و اضافه کردن پارامترهای لازم. بلوکهای پارامترهای جدید را بکش به داخل تعریف تابعت.
errorUnusedFunction: شما یک تابع ساختید اما هرگز آن را در فضای کاری خود استفاده نکردید! روی "توابع" در جعبه ابزار کلیک کنید و از آن در برنامه خود استفاده کنید.
errorUnusedParam: تو یک بلوک پارامتر اضافه کردی اما از آن در تعریف استفاده نکردی. مطمئن شو که از پارامترت استفاده میکنی با کلیک کردن روی "ویرایش" و قرار دادن بلوک پارامتر داخل بلوک سبز.
exactNumberOfBlocks: Only {numBlocks, plural, one {1 block} other {# blocks}} used!
exampleErrorMessage: تابع {functionName} یک یا بیشتر مثال دارد که نیاز به تنظیم دارد. مطمئن شوید که آن ها با تعریف شما همخوانی دارند و سوال را جواب می دهند.
examplesFailedOnClose: یک یا بیشتر از مثال های شما با تعریف شما همخوانی ندارند. مثال هایتان را قبل از بستن چک کنید
explainLessonExtras: When Lesson Extras is on, students will end each lesson with some bonus challenges and creative projects rather than being automatically advanced to the next lesson. This feature gives students the opportunity to expand their knowledge and further practice, without getting ahead of their classmates.
explainPairProgramming: When pair programming is turned on, students can choose to work with a classmate at the same computer. Turn this setting on if you want students to be able to work together while sharing progress.
extrasNoBonusLevels: There are no bonus levels for this stage.
extraTopBlocks: شما بلوک های جدا از هم داری.
extraTopBlocksWhenRun: بلوک های جدا از هم داری. آیا می خواهی که این ها را به بلوک "when run" وصل کنی؟
fewerNumberOfBlocks: Fewer than {numBlocks, plural, one {1 block} other {# blocks}} used!
finalStage: تبریک می‌گوییم! شما مرحله‌ی نهایی را به پایان رساندید.
finalStageTrophies: آفرین! شما مرحله‌ی نهایی را به پایان رساندید و برنده‌ی {numTrophies, plural, one {یک جایزه} other {# جایزه}} شدید.
findCourseDescription: Try new courses to add them to your homepage.
findGuestSpeakerDescription: Invite a local volunteer to visit your classroom or inspire your students remotely via video chat.
findLocalClassHeading: Find a local computer science class
findLocalClassDescription: Find a local after-school program, summer camp, or school to learn in person.
generatedCodeInfo: دانشگاههای برتر نیز کدنویسی بر اساس بلوک ها را آموزش می دهند (مثل {berkeleyLink} و {harvardLink}). اما در پشت پرده، بلوک هایی که شما سر هم کرده اید را می توان به زبان جاوا اسکریپت نشان داد، که پر استفاده ترین زبان کدنویسی در دنیاست:
hashError: با عرض پوزش، '%1' با هیچ کدام از برنامه‌های ذخیره شده مطابقت ندارد.
homepageUiTipAlreadyHome: You're already on your homepage.  It's now personalized for you because you're signed in.  You can find all your other resources here.
homepageUiTipKeyLinks: 1 of 2: All your key links are right here
homepageUiTipOtherLinks: 2 of 2: All other links are in this menu
homepageUiTipsBeforeDialogBody: This new design makes it easier to find all the things you need to prepare for your class, like reading your next lesson plan and reviewing students' progress.
homepageUiTipsAfterDialogBody: To learn more about these updates, please read our blog.
joinSectionDescription: Join your teacher's section by entering their Section Code.
joinTextTooltip: Create a piece of text by joining together multiple items.
keyValueCaption: Use key/value pairs to store a list of unique keys that map to values.
levelIncompleteError: You are using all of the necessary types of blocks but not in the right way.
lockFollowing: Lock the following stages that are currently unlocked:
lockAssessmentLong: Lock assessment when students finish using the "Lock Settings" button.
lockStageInstructions: Once time is up, "Lock stage" to hide questions.
lockWhenDone: Lock as soon as students are done
loginTypeCleverDescription: Sync your Code.org section with an existing Clever section.
loginTypeEmailDescription: Each student will create their own Code.org account using their email address.
loginTypeGoogleClassroomDescription: Sync your Code.org section with an existing Google Classroom.
loginTypeMicrosoftClassroomDescription: Sync your Code.org section with an existing Microsoft Classroom.
loginTypePictureDescription: You will create accounts for your students. Students will log in with a secret picture.
loginTypeWordDescription: You will create accounts for your students. Students will log in with a secret pair of words.
makeYourOwnFlappy: پرنده ی فلاپیِ خودتان را بسازید
missingRecommendedBlocksErrorMsg: Not quite. Try using a block you aren’t using yet.
missingRequiredBlocksErrorMsg: Not quite. You have to use a block you aren’t using yet.
nestedForSameVariable: شما از متغیر یکسانی برای حلقه های تو در تو استفاده کردید.بهتر است از متغیر های یکتا برای جلوگیری از بوجود آمدن حلقه های تکرار بی نهایت استفاده کنید.
nextLevel: آفرین! شما پازل {puzzleNumber} را به پایان رساندید.
nextLevelTrophies: آفرین! شما معمای {puzzleNumber} را به پایان رساندید و برنده‌ی {numTrophies, plural, one {یک جایزه} other {# جایزه}} شدید.
nextStage: آفرین! شما {stageName} را به پایان رساندید.
nextStageTrophies: آفرین! شما مرحله‌ی {stageName} را به پایان رساندید و برنده‌ی {numTrophies, plural, one {یک جایزه} other {# جایزه}} شدید.
numBlocksNeeded: آفرین! شما پازل {puzzleNumber} را به پایان رساندید. (اگرچه می‌توانستید تنها {numBlocks, plural, one {یک بلوک} other {# بلوک}} بکار ببرید.)
numLinesOfCodeWritten: شما همین الان  {numLines, plural, one {یک خط} other {# خط}} کد نوشتید!
orientationLock: قفل جهت یابی را در تنظیمات دستگاه باز کنید.
pairingNavigatorWarning: This puzzle was completed while pairing with {driver}. Look at this puzzle on their account to view the solution you created as a team.
pairingNavigatorLink: Click here to view the solution you created as a team.
playzoneArtistDescription: Draw cool pictures and designs with the Artist!
playzoneContinueButton: Go on to the next Stage
playzonePlaylabDescription: Create a story or make a game with Play Lab!
playzoneProjectsDescription: Revisit one of your existing projects.
playzoneSecondaryHeader: Ask your teacher what to do next
positionBottomOutLeft: to the bottom outside left position
positionBottomOutRight: to the bottom outside right position
positionOutBottomLeft: to the below bottom left position
positionOutBottomRight: to the below bottom right position
positionOutTopLeft: to the above top left position
positionOutTopRight: to the above top right position
positionTopOutLeft: to the top outside left position
positionTopOutRight: to the top outside right position
predictionInstructions: Make a prediction before you run the program.
professionalLearningDescription: Our highly-rated professional learning prepares you for your next computer science class.
projectsContinueWorking: Continue working on a recent project
projectGalleryCardDescription: Share your own creations or find inspiration from creations made by students all around the world.
projectsViewOldGallery: View old gallery with other project types
projectWarning: Note: You are on a level that is part of a longer project. Changes made on this level will also appear in other levels in the project.
providerManagedSection: This section is managed by {provider}. Add students there, then re-sync this section.
publishToPublicGalleryWarning: You are about to publish your project to the public gallery, meaning anyone in the world can view your project. Make sure your project does not contain any personal information.
question: Question
recommendedBlockContextualHintTitle: Try using a block like this to solve the puzzle.
relockStageInstructions: "Re-lock stage" to prevent sharing of answers with other classes/schools.
reviewResponses: Go to the assessment/survey tab for your section to review student responses.
runTooltip: برنامه‌ای را اجرا کن که با بلوک‌های داخل فضای کار تعریف شده.
runtimeErrorMsg: برنامه شما بدرستی اجرا نشده است. لطقا خط شماره {lineNumber} را حذف کنید و برنامه را دوباره اجرا کنید.
sectionsNotificationJoinFail: An error occurred attempting to join section {sectionId}.
selectSection: Select a section to be able to lock and unlock assessments or surveys. Click the lock settings button in the stage to the left.
selectSectionInstructions: Select a section to be able to lock and unlock assessments or surveys. Click the lock settings button in the stage to the left.
setupCoursesTeacher: Assign a course to your classroom or start your own course.
setupCoursesStudent: Browse Code.org's courses to find your next challenge.
shareFailure: با عرض پوزش، ما نمیتوانیم این برنامه را به اشتراک بگذاریم.
shareWarningsAge: لصا سن خود را در بخش زیر بنویسید و دکمه Ok را بزنید.
shareWarningsStoreData: This app built on Code Studio stores data that could be viewed by anyone with this sharing link, so be careful if you are asked to provide personal information.
showAnswersInstructions: "Show answers" to put the assessment into a read-only mode.
signup: برای دوره‌ی مقدماتی نام نویسی کنید
stageNotFullyLocked: Stage is not locked for all.
standaloneToolsDescription: In addition to our courses, teachers can use App Lab and Game Lab in any course to teach students how to create apps, animations, and games in JavaScript. And, we have lessons and widgets to teach encryption, text compression, and other computer science concepts.
standaloneToolsHeading: Tools for Middle and High School
standardsAndFrameworkDescription: Information about standards alignment for Code.org courses.
studentLockStateInstructions: Use the table below to control the state for each individual student.
submitYourProjectConfirm: You cannot edit your project after submitting it, really submit?
subtitle: یک محیط برنامه نویسیِ دیداری
syntaxErrorMsg: Your program contains a typo. Please remove line {lineNumber} and try again.
teacherCommunityDescription: Ask questions about curriculum, share ideas from your lessons, and get help from other teachers
teacherCourseHocDescription: Celebrated in December, but available year-round, the Hour of Code makes computer science fun and accessible to all ages.
teacherCourseHocLinkText: View more Hour of code tutorials
teacherCourseElementaryDescription: Teachers say our five elementary courses are 'totally awesome sauce' and fun for all students, even pre-readers.
teacherCourseMiddleDescription: Our new middle school course can be offered as a semester or year-long introduction to computer science for all students.
teacherCoursesHeading: Full course catalog from Code.org and 3rd party partners
teacherCoursesDescription: Select your grade below to see all courses and professional learning offered by Code.org and 3rd party partners.
teacherCourseHighDescription: We offer two year-long courses for high school: an intro course and an AP course. Both are designed to broaden participation in computer science.
toggleBlocksErrorMsg: شما باید یک خطا را در برنامه خود تصحیح کنید پیش از آنکه بتواند به شکل یک بلوک نشان داده شود.
tooManyBlocksMsg: این معما را می‌توان با بلوکهای <x id='START_SPAN'/><x id='END_SPAN'/> حل کرد.
tooMuchWork: شما منو مجبور به انجام مقدار زیادی کار کردید. میشه تعداد تکرار رو کمتر کنید؟
topCourseExplanation: Continue lesson to jump to where you left off or view the whole course to see an overview of your progress.
totalNumLinesOfCodeWritten: در مجموع: {numLines, plural, one {یک خط} other {# خط}} کد.
tryBlocksBelowFeedback: Try using one of the blocks below:
tryHOC: ساعتِ کد نویسی را امتحان کنید
unattachedBlockTipBody: Blocks that are not attached will not do anything. If you want these blocks in your program, try connecting them to other blocks.
unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred, please try again. If this keeps happening, try reloading the page.
unnamedFunction: شما یک متغیر یا تابع بدون نام دارید. فراموش نکنید که به هر چیز یک نام توصیفی بدهید.
unsubmitYourProjectConfirm: Unsubmitting your project will reset the submitted date, really unsubmit?
wantToLearn: آیا می‌خواهید کد نویسی را یاد بگیرید؟
whichCourse: Don't know which course to teach? Find a course from the courses page to assign a course to your section later.
announcementHeadingCsfAtoF: Courses 1-4 updated to align with grades K-5
announcementDescriptionCsfAtoF: We've tailored the courses to each grade level and re-dubbed them Courses A-F.
assignConfirm: Are you sure you want to assign "{assignmentName}" to "{sectionName}"?
courseBlocksCsfExpressDescription: A great option for students getting started on their own.  You'll learn the fundamentals of computer science with drag & drop blocks.  Create your own drawings and games.
courseBlocksCsfYoungHeading: Computer Science Fundamentals for Elementary Schools
courseBlocksCsfYoungDescription: For pre-readers in elementary school classrooms
courseBlocksCsfOlderDescription: For older students in elementary school classrooms
